Uses of Package
stincmale.ratmex.meter

  • Packages that use stincmale.ratmex.meter 
    Package Description
    stincmale.ratmex.executor
    Contains tools for executing tasks with a fixed rate.
    stincmale.ratmex.meter
    Contains tools for rate measuring.
  • Classes in stincmale.ratmex.meter used by stincmale.ratmex.executor 
    Class Description
    ConcurrentRateMeterStats
    Stats gathered by a thread-safe implementation of RateMeter which implements RateMeter.tick(long, long) in a relaxed way, that allows come ticks to be registered at an incorrect instant for example.
    RateMeter
    A utility that measures a rate of ticks by counting ticks in a moving time interval.
    RateMeterReading
    A modifiable RateMeter reading.
  • Classes in stincmale.ratmex.meter used by stincmale.ratmex.meter 
    Class Description
    AbstractNavigableMapRateMeter
    This is an almost complete implementation of AbstractRateMeter which only requires a correct parameters to be provided to the constructor.
    AbstractRateMeter
    A generic implementation of a configurable RateMeter.
    AbstractRingBufferRateMeter
    This is an almost complete implementation of AbstractRateMeter which only requires a correct parameters to be provided to the constructor.
    AbstractTicksCounter
    An abstract TicksCounter, which is a good start for a TicksCounter implementation.
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig
    A configuration that can be used to create concurrent implementations of AbstractRateMeter, e.g.
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig.Builder  
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig.Mode
    A mode of RateMeter.
    ConcurrentRateMeterStats
    Stats gathered by a thread-safe implementation of RateMeter which implements RateMeter.tick(long, long) in a relaxed way, that allows come ticks to be registered at an incorrect instant for example.
    LockStrategy
    A lock abstraction which allows implementations with different semantics, e.g.
    LongArray
    An array abstraction which allows implementations with different semantics.
    ParkWaitStrategy
    This implementation of WaitStrategy combines exponential backoff and parking.
    RateMeter
    A utility that measures a rate of ticks by counting ticks in a moving time interval.
    RateMeterConfig
    A configuration that can be used to create AbstractRateMeter.
    RateMeterConfig.Builder  
    RateMeterReading
    A modifiable RateMeter reading.
    ResettableRateMeter  
    TicksCounter
    A counter of ticks that can be used by RateMeter implementations.
    WaitStrategy
    An abstraction which allows implementations of different approaches to block on a condition.
    YieldWaitStrategy
    This implementation of WaitStrategy just spins calling Thread.yield() between tests of a condition.
